text: Tini'i tomaderake eka byakti theke srsti karechena o tara theke tara stri srsti karechena yate se tara kache santi paya [1]. Tarapara yakhana se tara sathe sangata haya takhana se eka halaka garbhadharana kare ebam eta niye se anayase calaphera kare. Atahpara garbha yakhana bhari haye ase takhana tara ubhaye tadera raba allahara kache prarthana kare, â€˜yadi apani amaderake eka purnanga santana dana karena tahale apanara prati krtajna thakaba.â€™
